trans-unit.source: Press Enter to manage your extensions.
Extension '{0}' not found in the Marketplace.
Press Enter to install '{0}' from the Marketplace.
Press Enter to search for '{0}' in the Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: 按 Enter 键在商店中搜索“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: In order to profile extensions a restart is required. Do you want to restart '{0}' now?
The extension '{0}' took a very long time to complete its last operation and it has prevented other extensions from running.
trans-unit.target: 扩展“{0}”的上一次操作花费时间较长，阻碍了其他扩展的运行。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, automatically installs updates for extensions. The updates are fetched from a Microsoft online service.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，将自动安装扩展更新。更新将从 Microsoft 联机服务中获取。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, automatically checks extensions for updates. If an extension has an update, it is marked as outdated in the Extensions view. The updates are fetched from a Microsoft online service.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，将自动检查扩展更新。若扩展存在更新，将在“扩展”视图中将其标记为过时扩展。更新将从 Microsoft 联机服务中获取。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the notifications for extension recommendations will not be shown.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，将不会显示扩展建议的通知。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, recommendations will not be fetched or shown unless specifically requested by the user. Some recommendations are fetched from a Microsoft online service.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，除非用户特别进行请求，将不会获取或显示推荐。某些推荐将从 Microsoft 联机服务中获取。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, editors with extension details will be automatically closed upon navigating away from the Extensions View.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，将在离开“扩展”视图时，自动关闭扩展详细信息页面。

trans-unit.source: When an extension is listed here, a confirmation prompt will not be shown when that extension handles a URI.
trans-unit.target: 当此处列出扩展名时，该扩展名处理URI时将不会显示确认提示。

trans-unit.source: Extension id or VSIX resource uri
Id of the extension to uninstall

trans-unit.target: 扩展 ID 是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Extension '{0}' is not installed. Make sure you use the full extension ID, including the publisher, e.g.: ms-vscode.csharp.
trans-unit.target: 未安装扩展“{0}”。请确保你使用包括发布者的完整的扩展 ID，例如 ms-vscode.csharp。
要在搜索中使用的查询

trans-unit.source: Activated by {1} because a file matching {1} exists in your workspace
Activated by {1} because file {0} exists in your workspace
Activated by {1} because searching for {0} took too long
trans-unit.target: 因搜索 {0} 耗时太长而被激活

trans-unit.source: Activated by {1} because you opened a {0} file
trans-unit.target: 因您打开了 {0} 文件而被激活

trans-unit.note: The {0} placeholder will be an activation event, like e.g. 'language:typescript', 'debug', etc.

trans-unit.source: Extension has caused the extension host to freeze.
trans-unit.target: 扩展已导致扩展主机冻结。

trans-unit.source: In order to profile extensions a restart is required. Do you want to restart '{0}' now?

trans-unit.target: 保存扩展宿主分析文件
在应用商店中搜索扩展
排序依据: 安装计数
在“{0}”小节中找到 1 个扩展。
在“{1}”小节中找到 {0} 个扩展。

trans-unit.source: Marketplace returned 'ECONNREFUSED'. Please check the 'http.proxy' setting.
We have uninstalled '{0}' which was reported to be problematic.
trans-unit.target: 我们卸载了“{0}”，它被报告存在问题。
您是否附上了 cpu 配置文件？

trans-unit.source: This is a reminder to make sure that you have not forgotten to attach '{0}' to the issue you have just created.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个提醒, 以确保您没有忘记将 "{0}" 附加到刚刚创建的问题。

trans-unit.source: This is a reminder to make sure that you have not forgotten to attach '{0}' to an existing performance issue.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个提醒, 以确保您没有忘记将 "{0}" 归入现有的性能问题中。

trans-unit.source: Disable other keymaps ({0}) to avoid conflicts between keybindings?
trans-unit.target: 是否禁用其他按键映射扩展 ({0})，从而避免按键绑定之间的冲突?

trans-unit.source: List of extensions which should be recommended for users of this workspace. The identifier of an extension is always '${publisher}.${name}'. For example: 'vscode.csharp'.
trans-unit.target: 向此工作区的用户推荐的扩展列表。扩展的标识符始终为 "${publisher}.${name}"。例如: "vscode.csharp"。

trans-unit.source: List of extensions recommended by VS Code that should not be recommended for users of this workspace. The identifier of an extension is always '${publisher}.${name}'. For example: 'vscode.csharp'.
trans-unit.target: 不应向此工作区的用户推荐的扩展列表。扩展的标识符始终为 "${publisher}.${name}"。例如: "vscode.csharp"。

trans-unit.source: Finished installing missing dependencies. Please reload the window now.
There are no missing dependencies to install.
This extension is reported to be problematic.
Unable to install extension '{0}' as it is not compatible with VS Code '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: 无法安装扩展名'{0}'，因为它不兼容 VS Code '{1}'。

trans-unit.source: Cannot disable extension '{0}'. Extension '{1}' depends on this.
trans-unit.target: 无法禁用扩展“{0}”。扩展“{1}”取决于此。

trans-unit.source: Cannot disable extension '{0}'. Extensions '{1}' and '{2}' depend on this.
trans-unit.target: 无法禁用扩展“{0}”。扩展“{1}”和扩展“{2}”取决于此。

trans-unit.source: Cannot disable extension '{0}'. Extensions '{1}', '{2}' and others depend on this.
trans-unit.target: 无法禁用扩展“{0}”。扩展“{1}”、“{2}”和其他扩展取决于此。

trans-unit.source: Extension details, rendered from the extension's 'README.md' file
trans-unit.target: 扩展详细信息，显示扩展的 "README.md" 文件。

trans-unit.source: Set of extensions that can be installed together
trans-unit.target: 多个可以一起安装的扩展

trans-unit.source: Lists contributions to VS Code by this extension
trans-unit.target: 包含此扩展向 VS Code 编辑器提供的功能

trans-unit.source: Extension update history, rendered from the extension's 'CHANGELOG.md' file
trans-unit.target: 扩展的更新历史，显示扩展的 "CHANGELOG.md" 文件。

trans-unit.source: Lists extensions this extension depends on
trans-unit.target: 包含此扩展依赖的扩展

trans-unit.source: You have chosen not to receive recommendations for this extension.
trans-unit.target: 您已选择不接收此扩展的推荐。

trans-unit.source: We cannot connect to the Extensions Marketplace at this time, please try again later.
trans-unit.target: 现在无法连接到扩展商店，请稍后再试。

trans-unit.source: Marketplace returned 'ECONNREFUSED'. Please check the 'http.proxy' setting.
This extension may interest you because it's popular among users of the {0} repository.
trans-unit.target: 您可能会对这个扩展感兴趣，它在 {0} 存储库的用户间流行。

trans-unit.source: This extension is recommended because you have {0} installed.
trans-unit.target: 根据你安装的 {0}，向你推荐此扩展。

trans-unit.source: This extension is recommended based on the files you recently opened.
trans-unit.target: 根据您最近打开的文件推荐此扩展。

trans-unit.source: This extension is recommended by users of the current workspace.
trans-unit.target: 当前工作区的用户推荐此扩展。
有对于此工作区的扩展建议。

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' extension is recommended as you have {1} installed on your system.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统上已安装 {1}，则建议使用“{0}”扩展。

trans-unit.source: Do you want to ignore all extension recommendations?
trans-unit.target: 你是否要忽略所有推荐的扩展?

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' extension is recommended for this file type.
trans-unit.target: 建议对这种类型的文件使用“{0}”扩展。

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' extension pack is recommended for this file type.
trans-unit.target: 建议对这种类型的文件使用“{0}”扩展包。

trans-unit.source: The Marketplace has extensions that can help with '.{0}' files
trans-unit.target: 商店中有可以对 ".{0}" 文件提供帮助的扩展。
{0}。按 Enter 可获取扩展详细信息。
{0}。按 Enter 可获取扩展详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Once downloaded, please manually install the downloaded VSIX of '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 下载后，请手动安装“{0}”的 VSIX。

trans-unit.source: Installing extension {0} started. An editor is now open with more details on this extension
trans-unit.target: 已启动安装扩展 {0}。将打开编辑器，显示此扩展的更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Installing extension {0} is completed. Please reload Visual Studio Code to enable it.
trans-unit.target: 已完成安装扩展 {0}。请重新加载 Visual Studio Code 进行启用。

trans-unit.source: Please reload Visual Studio Code to complete the uninstallation of the extension {0}.
trans-unit.target: 请重新加载 Visual Studio Code 以完成对扩展 {0} 的卸载。
已启动更新扩展 {0} 到版本 {1}。
已完成更新扩展 {0} 到版本 {1}。

trans-unit.source: All extensions are up to date.
An update to an extension which is disabled is available.
{0} extension updates are available. One of them is for a disabled extension.
trans-unit.target: {0} 个扩展存在更新。其中 1 个是禁用扩展。

trans-unit.source: {0} extension updates are available. All of them are for disabled extensions.
trans-unit.target: {0} 个扩展存在更新。其全部为禁用扩展。

trans-unit.source: {0} extension updates are available. {1} of them are for disabled extensions.
trans-unit.target: {0} 个扩展存在更新。其中 {1} 个是禁用扩展。

trans-unit.source: Please reload Visual Studio Code to complete the uninstallation of this extension.
trans-unit.target: 请重新加载 Visual Studio Code 以完成此扩展的卸载。

trans-unit.source: Please reload Visual Studio Code to enable the updated extension.
trans-unit.target: 请重新启动 Visual Studio Code 以完成对此扩展的更新。

trans-unit.source: Please reload Visual Studio Code to enable this extension.
trans-unit.target: 请重新加载 Visual Studio Code 以启用此扩展。

trans-unit.source: Please reload Visual Studio Code to disable this extension.

trans-unit.target: 安装工作区推荐的所有扩展

trans-unit.source: Do not recommend this extension again
Unable to create 'extensions.json' file inside the '.vscode' folder ({0}).
trans-unit.target: 无法在 ".vscode" 文件夹({0})内创建 "extensions.json" 文件。
配置建议的扩展(工作区)
配置建议的扩展(工作区文件夹)
添加到推荐的扩展(工作区文件夹)
忽略推荐的扩展(工作区文件夹)

trans-unit.source: There are no workspace folders open to add recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 当前没有打开的工作区文件夹，无法添加推荐。

trans-unit.source: This extension is already present in this workspace folder's recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 工作区文件夹的推荐中已包含此扩展。

trans-unit.source: The extension was successfully added to this workspace folder's recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 已成功添加此扩展到工作区文件夹的推荐中。

trans-unit.source: This extension is already present in this workspace folder's unwanted recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 工作区文件夹的不需要推荐中已包含此扩展。

trans-unit.source: The extension was successfully added to this workspace folder's unwanted recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 已成功添加此扩展到工作区文件夹的不需要推荐中。
添加到推荐的扩展(工作区)
忽略推荐的扩展(工作区)

trans-unit.source: This extension is already present in workspace recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 工作区推荐中已包含此扩展。

trans-unit.source: The extension was successfully added to this workspace's recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 已成功添加此扩展到工作区推荐中。

trans-unit.source: This extension is already present in workspace unwanted recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 工作区的不需要推荐中已包含此扩展。

trans-unit.source: The extension was successfully added to this workspace's unwanted recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 已成功添加此扩展到工作区的不需要推荐中。

trans-unit.source: This extension was reported to be problematic.
trans-unit.target: 此扩展被报告存在问题。

trans-unit.source: This extension is enabled for this workspace by the user.
This extension is disabled globally by the user.
This extension is disabled for this workspace by the user.

trans-unit.id: Install language pack also in remote server
trans-unit.source: Install the language pack extension on '{0}' to enable it also there.
Install the language pack extension locally to enable it also there.

trans-unit.id: Install in other server to enable
trans-unit.source: Install the extension on '{0}' to enable.
This extension has defined that it cannot run on the remote server
trans-unit.target: 此扩展已定义指示它无法在远程服务器上运行

trans-unit.source: Extension is enabled on '{0}' and disabled locally.
Extension is enabled locally and disabled on '{0}'.

trans-unit.target: 禁用所有已安装的扩展

trans-unit.source: Disable All Installed Extensions for this Workspace
trans-unit.target: 禁用此工作区的所有已安装的扩展

trans-unit.source: Enable All Extensions for this Workspace
trans-unit.target: 启用这个工作区的所有扩展

trans-unit.source: Please reload Visual Studio Code to complete installing the extension {0}.
trans-unit.target: 请重新加载 Visual Studio Code 以完成扩展 {0} 的安装。
选择要重新安装的扩展

trans-unit.source: Please reload Visual Studio Code to complete reinstalling the extension {0}.
trans-unit.target: 请重新加载 Visual Studio Code 以完成扩展 {0} 的重新安装。
扩展 {0} 重新安装完毕。

trans-unit.source: Please reload Visual Studio Code to complete installing the extension {0}.
trans-unit.target: 请重新加载 Visual Studio Code 以完成扩展 {0} 的安装。

trans-unit.source: There are no extensions to install.
Successfully installed extensions in {0}. Please reload the window to enable them.
Button background color for actions extension that stand out (e.g. install button).
trans-unit.target: 扩展中突出操作的按钮背景色（比如 安装按钮）。

trans-unit.source: Button foreground color for actions extension that stand out (e.g. install button).
trans-unit.target: 扩展中突出操作的按钮前景色（比如 安装按钮）。

trans-unit.source: Button background hover color for actions extension that stand out (e.g. install button).
trans-unit.target: 扩展中突出操作的按钮被悬停时的颜色（比如 安装按钮）。
